page.title: 10Children's Recreation, Wray
page.content: {Jane}: If it is sunny I go swimming in the river or go and play in the woods. Sometimes I make a den there with my friends. I ride my bike or play ball games on the wall. If it rains I play games on the computer. I read books and watch television. One of my favourite games is Monopoly. {Timothy}: I ride my bike and go fishing. I usually catch eels. {Tanya}: I like to make dens in trees, play in the hay and straw, and hide and seek. I like to play cards inside, like Last Card and Snap. {Maree}: On rainy days I play cards or paint or play the piano. {Sonya}: I ride my horse, I watch a video, I read in bed. {Catharine}: I draw pictures and I play with Anna. We sometimes play hospitals. I like to read.
